snippet: Militants unleashed a wave of attacks in Iraq on Thursday, mainly targeting Shiite areas in and around Baghdad, killing at least 50 people and wounding dozens, the authorities said.
abstract: Militants unleash wave of attacks in Iraq, mainly targeting Shiite areas in and around Baghdad, killing at least 50 people and wounding dozens; Islamic State group claims responsibility for attacks.
lead_paragraph: Militants unleashed a wave of attacks in Iraq on Thursday, mainly targeting Shiite areas in and around Baghdad, killing at least 50 people and wounding dozens, the authorities said.

headline.main: Iraq: Attacks in Baghdad Area Leave at Least 50 Dead
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Attacks in Baghdad Area Leave at Least 50 Dead

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
